document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2006-06
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON, CALIFORNIA, ADDING CHAPTER 18.32 TO DIVISION 2, TITLE 18 OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE SETTING STANDARDS FOR CONDOMINIUM, COMMUNITY APARTMENT PROJECTS AND STOCK COOPERATIVE CONVERSIONS AND ADDING CHAPTER 18.34 TO DIVISION 2, TITLE 18 OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE REGARDING RELOCATION ASSISTANCE TO TENANTS OF APARTMENTS TO BE CONVERTED TO CONDOMINIUMS, COMMUNITY APARTMENT PROJECTS AND STOCK COOPERATIVES
